# shprplotfun

The goal of shprplotfun is to provide functionality to produce the annual report for the Swedish Hip Arthroplasty Register.

## Installation

You can install the latest version of shprplotfun with:

``` r
# install.packages("devtools")
devtools::install_github("swehip/shprplotfun")
```
